name: ComposeUsing
shortdesc: Hyphenation exceptions list options for composing text.

property.name: USE_USER_DICTIONARY
property.shortdesc: Uses the list stored in the external user dictionary.

property.name: USE_DOCUMENT
property.shortdesc: Uses the list stored in the document.

property.name: BOTH
property.shortdesc: Uses the lists stored in both the document and the user dictionary.
